dublin_core.dcvalue: There is a critical shortage of specialty rheumatology services in Canada The impact is felt more in rural and northern regions than on urban areas of the country In response to the need this study was conducted to compare the satisfaction of referring physicians with rheumatology services through conventional visiting specialty clinics email consults and regularly scheduled videoconference
A comparative study on the utility of telehealth in the provision of rheumatology services to rural and northern communities.
